files.name: stylesheet
files.source:
<style>

html{
    position:relative;
}

body {
    background-color:#E6E6E6;
    background-attachment: fixed;
    background-attachment: cover;
    background-repeat:no-repeat;
    font: 14px verdana, sans-serif;
}

h1 {
    color: black;
    text-align:center;
}

#title{
    position:absolute;
    top:0px;
    left:0px;
    width:100%;
    height:40px;
    background-color:#CEF6CE;
    z-index: 7;
}

#menu{
    position:absolute;
    top:40px;
    left:0px;
    width:100%;
    height:5px;
    background-color:green;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 5px 10px 0px rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.3);
    -moz-box-shadow:    0px 5px 10px 0px rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.3);
    box-shadow:         0px 5px 10px 0px rgba(50, 50, 50, 0.3);
    z-index: 7;
}

#menu p{
    padding-left:15px;
    margin-top:3px;
    margin-bottom:2px;
}

#menu table{
    color:white;
}

#footer{
    background-color:green;
    color:white;
    width:100%;
    height:30px;
    position:absolute;
    bottom:0px;
    left:0px;
    text-align:center;
}

#footer a:hover{
    text-decoration:underline;
    cursor:pointer;
}


.ads{
    background-color:white;
    opacity:0.6;
    border-radius:5px;
}

.dynamicmap {
        width: 600px;
        height: 330px;
        left:0px;
        top:5px;
        border-radius:5px;
        border:1px solid black;
        position:absolute;
        z-index: 4;
        -webkit-transition: width 0.3s ease-in, height 0.3s ease-in;
	    -moz-transition: width 0.3s ease-in, height 0.3s ease-in;
	    -o-transition: width 0.3s ease-in, height 0.3s ease-in;
	    transition: width 0.3s ease-in, height 0.3s ease-in;
      }
      
.dynamicmapchange{
        width: 930px;
        height: 450px;
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 20px black;
}

.catheader{
    color:white;
    z-index: 1;
    position:relative;
}

.largetiletable, .midtalltiletable{
    height:676px;
}

.smalltiletable, .midlargetiletable{
    height:332px;
}

.largetiletable, .midlargetiletable{
    width:600px;
}

.smalltiletable, .midtalltiletable{
    width:300px;
}

.tile{
    position:relative;
}

.smalltiletable, .largetiletable, .midtalltiletable{
    border-spacing:2px;
}

#maintbl{
    margin-left:auto;
    margin-right:auto;
    text-align:center;
    width:900px;
    border-style:none;
    position:relative;
}

#topband {
    margin-left:auto;
    margin-right:auto;
    border-style:none;
}

tr, td{
    border-style:none;
}

.carheader{
    margin-left:auto;
    margin-right:auto;
}

.blank{
    width:600px;
}

.showhide{
    font:10px "Times New Roman";
    color:blue;
    visibility:hidden;
}

.showhide:hover{
    color:red;
    cursor:pointer;
}

#logdatatable{
    margin-left:auto;
    margin-right:auto;
    margin-bottom:5px;
    position:relative;
    top:15px;
}

#addlogtable{
    padding-right: 15px;
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-top: 15px;
    padding-bottom: 15px;
    margin-left:auto;
    margin-right:auto;
    border:1px solid green;
    background-color:white;
    border-radius:10px;
}

.loginput{
    background-color:white;
    border:1px solid green;
}

#lastnext, #addlogbuttontable, #todaylogtable, #weeklogtable, #monthlogtable, #minimaps, #stattable{
    margin-left:auto;
    margin-right:auto;
}

#maps, #currentposition{
    text-align:center;
}

#currentposition{
    border-spacing:9px;
}

#stattable
{
    text-align:left;
    position:relative;
    top:10px;
    border-spacing:5px;
    font:14px verdana, sans-serif;
    
}

hr{
   width:50px;
   margin-left:auto;
   margin-right:auto;
   border-color:green;
}

.positionlabels{
    text-align:right;
    font-weight:bold;
    color:green;
}

#location, #history, #stats, #maps, #logdata, #gallery{
    border-radius:5px;
    position:relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

#location, #logdata, #gallery, #maps{
    height:300px;
}

#history {
    height:640px;
    position:relative;
    top:15px;
}

#stats{
    height:640px;
}

.space{
   margin-bottom: 0px;
   margin-top: 0px;
}

.headerbg{
    background-color:green;
    color:white;
    border-radius:5px;
    border:1px solid black;
    opacity:0.8;
    position:absolute;
    top:2px;
    height:26px;
    z-index: 0;
}

.contentbg{
    border-radius:5px;
    background-color:#CEF6CE;
    border:1px solid black;
    opacity:0.9;
    position:absolute;
    top:32px;
}

#todayheader,#weekheader,#monthheader{
  text-align:center;
  font-weight:bold;
  margin-top: 5px; 
  margin-bottom: 5px;
}        

.weekarrow{
  padding-right: 1px;
  padding-left: 1px;
  padding-top: 5px;
}

.todaylogcells, .weeklogcells, .monthlogcells{
    text-align:center;
    padding-right: 15px;
    padding-left: 15px;
    border-radius:5px;
    width:70px;
}

.tablecyclingheader{
    background-color:green;
    color:white;
}

.tablewalkingheader{
    background-color:green;
    color:white;
}

.tableswimmingheader{
    background-color:green;
    color:white;
}

.tabletotalheader{
    background-color:green;
    color:white;
    font-weight:bold;
}

.tablecyclingcontent{
    background-color:white;
    color:black;
    border:1px solid green;
}

.tablewalkingcontent{
    background-color:white;
    color:black;
    border:1px solid green;
}

.tableswimmingcontent{
    background-color:white;
    color:black;
    border:1px solid green;
}

.tabletotalcontent{
    background-color:white;
    color:black;
    border:1px solid green;
    font-weight:bold;
}

.addlogcells{
    text-align:center;
}

.labeladdlogcells{
    text-align:right;
    padding-right: 5px;
    padding-left: 5px;
    font-weight:bold;
}

.loginput{
    width:100px;
    background-color:white;
    border-radius:3px;
    font-size:14px;
    padding-left: 5px;
}

#buttonlogok{
    width:85px;
    height:35px;
    border-radius:3px;
    background-color:white;
    border:1px solid green;
    color:black;
}

#buttonlogok:hover{
    background-color:#CEF6CE;
}

#loginputtable{
    border-spacing:2px
}

.monthheader{
    text-align:center;
    padding-right: 5px;
    padding-left: 5px;
    width:25px;
    background-color:#D3D3D3;
    color:black;
    border:1px solid black;
    border-radius:5px;
}

#monthlogtable{
    position:relative;
}

#todaydiv, #weekdiv, #monthdiv, #history{
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
}

#addloglink{
    text-align:center;
}

#addloglink:hover{
    text-align:center;
    color:red;
    cursor:pointer;
}

#table,#td{
    border:1px solid red;
}

#selection{
    background-color:#CEF6CE;
    color:green;
    border:1px solid green;
    border-radius:3px;
    position:relative;
    left:5px;
    top:10px;
}

.monthrow:hover .monthlogcells{
   background-color:#CEF6CE;
}

#blackfilter{
   background-color:white;
   position:fixed;
   top:0;
   left:0;
   width:100%;
   height:100%;
   opacity:0.8;
   z-index:5;
   visibility: hidden;
}

#achievement{
   background-color:#CEF6CE;
   position:fixed;
   margin-left:auto;
   margin-right:auto;
   width:500px;
   height:300px;
   opacity:1;
   border:1px solid green;
   border-radius:5px;
   z-index:6;
   visibility: hidden;
}



.bss-slides{
  background: #000;
  position: relative;
  left:-3px;
  height:332px;
  width:600px;
  border-radius:5px;
  display: block;   
}
.bss-slides:focus{
 outline: 0;
}
.bss-slides figure{
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  
}
.bss-slides figure img{
  opacity: 0;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 1.2s;
  transition: opacity 1.2s;
  position: relative;
  left:-40px;
  top:-14px;
  border-radius:5px;
  border:1px solid black
/*-webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
  backface-visibility: hidden;
  */
}
.bss-slides .bss-show {
  z-index: 3;
}
.bss-slides .bss-show img{
  opacity: 1;
 /* -webkit-backface-visibility: hidden;
  backface-visibility: hidden;*/
}

.bss-slides figcaption{
  position: absolute;
  font-family: sans-serif;
  font-size: .8em;
  bottom: 2em;
  right: 4em;
  padding: .25em;
  color: #fff;
  background: #000;
  background: rgba(0,0,0, .25);
  border-radius: 2px;
  opacity: 0;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 1.2s;
  transition: opacity 1.2s;
}
.bss-slides .bss-show figcaption{
  z-index: 2;
  opacity: 1;
}
.bss-slides figcaption a{
  color: #fff;    
}
.bss-next, .bss-prev{
  color: #fff;
  position: absolute;
  background: #000;
  background: rgba(0,0,0, .6);
  top: 50%;
  z-index: 4;
  font-size: 2em;
  margin-top: -1.2em;
  opacity: .5;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
}
.bss-next:hover, .bss-prev:hover{
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 1;
}
.bss-next{
  right: 0;
  padding: 10px 5px 15px 10px;
  border-top-left-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
}
.bss-prev{
  left: 0;
  padding: 10px 10px 15px 5px;
  border-top-right-radius: 3px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
}
.bss-fullscreen{
  display: block;
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;    
  background: rgba(0,0,0,.3) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/arrows-alt_ffffff_64.png); 
  -webkit-background-size: contain; 
  background-size: contain;
  position: absolute;
  top: 5px;
  left: 5px;   
  cursor: pointer;    
  opacity: .3;
} 
.bss-fullscreen:hover{
  opacity: .8;   
}
:-webkit-full-screen .bss-fullscreen{
    background: rgba(0,0,0,.4) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/compress_ffffff_64.png);
    -webkit-background-size: contain;
    background-size: contain;
}
:-moz-full-screen .bss-fullscreen{
    background: rgba(0,0,0,.4) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/compress_ffffff_64.png);
    background-size: contain;
}
:-ms-fullscreen .bss-fullscreen{
    background: rgba(0,0,0,.4) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/compress_ffffff_64.png);
    background-size: contain;
}
:full-screen .bss-fullscreen{
    background: rgba(0,0,0,.4) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/compress_ffffff_64.png);
    -webkit-background-size: contain;
    background-size: contain;
}
:-webkit-full-screen .bss-fullscreen{
    background: rgba(0,0,0,.4) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/compress_ffffff_64.png);
    -webkit-background-size: contain;
    background-size: contain;
}
:-moz-full-screen .bss-fullscreen{
    background: rgba(0,0,0,.4) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/compress_ffffff_64.png);
    background-size: contain;
}
:-ms-fullscreen .bss-fullscreen{
    background: rgba(0,0,0,.4) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/compress_ffffff_64.png);
    background-size: contain;
}
:fullscreen .bss-fullscreen{
    background: rgba(0,0,0,.4) url(http://virtualtranscanada.com/resources/compress_ffffff_64.png);
    -webkit-background-size: contain;
    background-size: contain;
}


</style>
